amendment.description: To establish a grant program for training wind technicians.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 1419 withdrawn in Senate.
Amendment SA 1419 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Ernst to Amendment SA 1407. (consideration: CR S1452-1453; text: CR S1452-1453) To establish a grant program for training wind technicians.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1419 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Ernst to Amendment SA 1407.
